Test Name: Biliary Tract Malignancy Cytology and FISH
Specimen Type: Bile duct brushings or bile fluid
Purpose: To detect biliary tract malignancy using Cytology and Fluorescence In Situ Hybridization (FISH) techniques.
Equipment: Microscope slides, sterile pipettes, cytospin or centrifuge, staining kits, FISH probes, fluorescence microscope
